Articles.Content:
So I have around 150 hours in ksp and still haven't left Kerbins SOI! Oh no! But anyway, I decided to stop lurking on here and actually make an account so I could hopefully contribute to some of the amazing threads here.

And heres an image of my first probe to duna! hindsight has shown that i didnt think everything through, so we'll see how things play out... See if you can spot it! The second is of today's test on sending a manned lander with rover to another body.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Hello DrMarlboro, and welcome to the forums!

Good luck with your Duna mission.

I'm looking forward to seeing your contributions to the community.

Happy landings!

Welcome to the forum!

Glad you finally took the leap to interplanetary travel! It will become more and more fun as you get better and more efficient at it.
